about_the_game:
Pick a theme and craft your own story by making branching choices that shape each unique adventure.

You'll be able to explore distinct themes, each offering a unique scenario:

  • Embark on a seven-year journey at a magic school, where you'll master your powers and unravel ancient mysteries

  • Lead a party of heroes on a rescue mission to save a lost prince

  • Establish and fortify an outpost in newly conquered territory, ensuring the prosperity and security of your ancient empire’s expansion

Features

  • Including a variety of unique themes and situations to start your journey from

  • Customize characters looks, abilities and backstories

  • Guide your story with meaningful choices that mold your characters and their world

  • Intuitive controls, game-play and interactions

  • Cute 3D art-style

  • Discover secret and hidden elements to personalize your creations

  • Be careful, as you shape your creations, they shape you

short_description: How would your life look like if you entered a magic school? if you became a monster hunter? or maybe if you were transported to another world? Pick your scenario, make your choice and discover what you become in this highly customizable choose your own adventure game
